entry.data:
PARTLY SUNNY THIS MORNING, THEN CLEARING
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 40S
NORTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 20S
NORTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

PARTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 40S
CALM WINDS, BECOMING SOUTHEAST AROUND 5 MPH IN THE AFTERNOON

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN CLEARING
LOWS IN THE LOWER 30S
SOUTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 50S
SOUTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 40S
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 60S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 40S
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 60S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE UPPER 40S
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
SHOWERS LIKELY, MAINLY IN THE MORNING
HIGHS IN THE MID 60S
CHANCE OF RAIN 60 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
A 50 PERCENT CHANCE OF SHOWERS
LOWS IN THE LOWER 50S

MOSTLY SUNNY WITH A 30 PERCENT CHANCE OF SHOWERS
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 60S
